articles.author: Spencer Legacy
articles.title: Disney+ to Remove ‘Certain Content’ From Streaming Platform - ComingSoon.net
articles.description: Disney is planning to remove "certain content" from their Disney+ streaming service in the coming months, according to an earnings call.
articles.content:
Disney is planning to remove certain content from their Disney+ streaming service in the coming months as part of strategic changes to their content curation.
Variety has reported that during Disney… [+987 chars]

articles.author: Josh Croxton
articles.title: Peloton issues stop-ride and voluntary recall of 2.2 million bikes - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Consumers should "immediately stop using" the bikes, as rider suffers fractured wrist
articles.content:
Amercian indoor cycling behemoth, Peloton, is recalling close to 2.2 million bikes due to a fault in the seatpost that could lead to it breaking unexpectedly.
